items.sentence: I still need to see if Tom wants to go with us.
Tom has just about everything a man could want.
Tom might be playing chess with Mary right now.
How long did it take Tom to build the doghouse?
I'd go visit Tom in the hospital if I were you.
I don't want Tom to know how much money I make.
You not only look like Tom, you sound like him.
You don't have any idea where Tom went, do you?
Tom hasn't been able to get a hold of Mary yet.
Tom was careful not to leave the door unlocked.
